data.name: Legends of Ethernal
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the World of Arkanys

On a summer morning, a young boy finds his home wrecked and his family gone. Armed with courage and driven by the pain of his loss, he sets out on a journey to find out the truth. What he is about to discover will forever change the World of Arkanys...

Legends of Ethernal is the first game developed by Lucid Dreams Studio. It is a 2D single-player action adventure game where you need to explore beautiful hand-crafted environments to find out the truth about your parents' disappearance. Through your journey, you will meet strange people, solve dynamic puzzles and battle tough creatures.

It is planned to be released sometime early 2019. As the first entry in the Ethernal Universe on which the studio plans on building up, this game set up the backstory of important events in the world of Arkanys that will shape the fate of entire nations.

Game Features


  • Evolving Gameplay
    Enjoy mechanics that are unlocking with weapons and items that you find

  • Puzzling Dungeons
    Solve puzzles and unleash your strategies against boss battles in multiple dungeons

  • Crafting System
    Gather components and craft recipes during the course of your journey to help you progress through the game

  • Unique and Gorgeous Art
    Admire beautiful 2D hand-drawn art covering multiple environments

  • Mysterious Lore
    Discover the World of Arkanys, a land filled with strange creatures, treasures and secrets

  • Enigmatic Events
    Experience a compelling and meaningful storyline with amazing characters

  • Melodic Musical Score
    Listen to the wonderfully crafted score, produced and recorded by veteran musician William Gough

data.short_description: "Legends of Ethernal" is a 2D single-player action adventure game where you need to explore beautiful hand-crafted environments, solve clever puzzles and battle tough creatures to uncover the truth about your parents’ disappearance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+ or later (64 bit)
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.11 or later
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
